name: Lakelight Elementary Incident 68
description:
⚫Lakelight Elementary Incident 68 is a realistic urban exploration VHS  Found Footage horror title where you unveil the past and afterlife through your camera.

Key Features⚫Utilize your camera mechanics including sepia cam mode, limited blitz mechanic and B/W Spirit cam mode allowing you to see ghosts and secrets as well as solve ghost event puzzles to uncover the story of Lakelight Elementary by discovering the past events through your camera.

⚫Explore the abandoned Lakelight elementary school, discover the American schools history and what ultimately led to its closure in 1968, discover stories surrounding the characters that once were here and unveil how Malaysian folklore crept its way into the school halls.

⚫3 possible endings - 1 good - 1 bad - 1 secret.

Launch Trailer:

⚫Part of my Urbex "Incident" Tape series, this being the third installment.

The full Urbex "Incident" Tape series will feature 4 unique tapes.

When all games are released, i will include a bundle package where you can get the full urbex vhs found footage incident series at a reduced price!

  • Grainwind Incident 77 - Free https://azagamestudio.itch.io/grainwind-incident-77
  • Sanevol Incident 44 - Paid - Out now! https://azagamestudio.itch.io/sanevol-incident-44
  • Lakelight Elementary Incident 68 -  Paid - Out now!  https://azagamestudio.itch.io/lakelight-elementary-incident-68
  • Nihil Ignis Incident 48 - Paid - Coming soon

Each tape features unique places and different "incidents". Each can be played individually and are not connected.

⚫This is a experimental horror title, featuring non-linear exploration with no hand-holding asking you to explore everywhere as the aim of the game was to produce a realistic urbex feeling. The game changes the longer you play & evolves accordingly, what ending you get is determined by your own actions later on. The game provides full freedom for the player, the game is intended to be played in a single session each time to unlock the different endings. Many elements of the game are randomized causing each play through to be a unique experience.

⚫Features

  • Realistic urban exploration feeling
  • B/W Spirit camera mode and ghost event puzzles
  • Puzzles
  • Sepia camera mode
  • Limited blitz mechanic
  • Realistic audio design
  • No hand holding, non-linear exploration
  • 3 possible endings - 1 good - 1 bad - 1 secret
  • Randomized audio design and events

⚫Controls

  • Movement = WASD
  • RUN = Left shift
  • CROUCH = Left ctrl CRAWL = C
  • EXAMINE NEWSPAPER / OBJECT = Q READ = E
  • ZOOM WITH CAMERA = Right mouse button
  • CAMERA B/W SPIRIT MODE = F
  • LIMITED CAMERA FLASH BLITZ = G
  • SEPIA CAMERA MODE = R = Activate  | T = deactivate
  • INTERACT =  Press E
  • Best played in 1920x1080 resolution
  • You can adjust quality settings inside the game through ESC > Options
  • You can view / edit controls inside the game through ESC > Controls

The game only supports Keyboard&Mouse .

WARNING: This game contains gore as well as flashing lights etc. which could trigger a seizure in some, play at your own risk.
